languages.text: "Мандрагоры. Последователи Назракея. Остатки Опустошительной бури... нет, я все еще в опасности. Но рискнут ли они охотиться на меня — друкари, живущего в реальном мире, уничтожившего всех своих врагов? Сомневаюсь".

traits.locale_text: "Мандрагоры. Последователи Назракея. Остатки Опустошительной бури... нет, я все еще в опасности. Но рискнут ли они охотиться на меня — друкари, живущего в реальном мире, уничтожившего всех предводителей своих врагов? Сомневаюсь".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."
languages.original_text: "Мандрагоры. Последователи Назракея. Остатки Опустошительной бури... нет, я все еще в опасности. Но рискнут ли они охотиться на меня — друкари, живущего в реальном мире, уничтожившего всех своих врагов? Сомневаюсь".

traits.locale_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in the realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? This I doubt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in the realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? This I doubt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Mandraks. Nazrakheis Anhänger. Die Überreste des plündernden Sturms ... Nein, ich bin noch immer in Gefahr. Aber werden sie es riskieren, mich zu jagen? Einen Drukhari, der im Realraum lebt und alle seine Feinde zerstört hat? Ich bezweifle es."
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: "Mandraks. Nazrakheis Anhänger. Die Überreste des plündernden Sturms ... Nein, ich bin noch immer in Gefahr. Aber werden sie es riskieren, mich zu jagen? Einen Drukhari, der im Realraum lebt und alle seine Feinde zerstört hat? Ich bezweifle es."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “还有曼德拉，纳札骸的追随者，还有狂风阴谋团的残党……不，我的生命仍处于黑暗之中。不过我生活在真实世界，还消灭了我所有的敌人，那些人真的打算继续冒险追杀我吗？我对此深表怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: “还有曼德拉，纳札骸的追随者，还有狂风阴谋团的残党……不，我的生命仍处于黑暗之中。不过我生活在真实世界，还消灭了我所有的敌人，那些人真的打算继续冒险追杀我吗？我对此深表怀疑。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Les Mandragores. Les partisans de Nazrakhei. Les rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse... Je suis toujours en danger. Mais risqueraient-ils de s'en prendre à moi, un Drukhari qui vit dans l'espace réel et a anéanti tous ses ennemis ? J'en doute. »
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: « Les Mandragores. Les partisans de Nazrakhei. Les rescapés de la Tempête ravageuse... Je suis toujours en danger. Mais risqueraient-ils de s'en prendre à moi, un Drukhari qui vit dans l'espace réel et a anéanti tous ses ennemis ? J'en doute. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Las mandrágoras. Los seguidores de Nazrakhei. Los restos de la Tempestad Asoladora... No, aún corro peligro. Pero ¿se atreverán a dar caza a un Drukhari que vive en el espacio real y ha masacrado a todos sus enemigos? Lo dudo mucho».
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: «Las mandrágoras. Los seguidores de Nazrakhei. Los restos de la Tempestad Asoladora... No, aún corro peligro. Pero ¿se atreverán a dar caza a un Drukhari que vive en el espacio real y ha masacrado a todos sus enemigos? Lo dudo mucho».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「マンドレイク、ナズラクヘイの追従者だ。略奪の嵐の残骸…つまり答えはノーだ。俺はまだ危険の中にいる。だが奴らは、俺様を追う危険を冒すか？リアルスペースに住み、敵を一掃したデュカーリを？いや、そうは思えない」
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: 「マンドレイク、ナズラクヘイの追従者だ。略奪の嵐の残骸…つまり答えはノーだ。俺はまだ危険の中にいる。だが奴らは、俺様を追う危険を冒すか？リアルスペースに住み、敵を一掃したデュカーリを？いや、そうは思えない」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Kankurutanlar. Nazrakhei'in takipçileri. Müfteris Kasırga'dan arta kalanlar. Hayır, hâlâ tehlikedeyim. Fakat benim gibi gerçekuzayda yaşayan, tüm düşmanlarını yok etmiş olan bir Drukhari'nin peşine düşme riskini alırlar mı? Pek sanmam."
languages.original_text: "Mandrakes. Nazrakhei's followers. The remains of the Reaving Tempest... No, I am still in danger. But will they risk hunting me, a Drukhari who lives in realspace and has destroyed all of his enemies? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: "Kankurutanlar. Nazrakhei'in takipçileri. Müfteris Kasırga'dan arta kalanlar. Hayır, hâlâ tehlike altındayım. Ama benim gibi gerçekuzayda yaşayan ve tüm düşmanlarını yok etmiş olan bir Drukhari'nin peşine düşme riskine girerler mi? Ondan şüpheliyim."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
